Play.Header: BUF wins toss, elects to Receive, and NE elects to defend the North goal.

4-A.Vinatieri kicks 69 yards from NE 30 to BUF 1. 24-T.McGee (didn't try to advance) to BUF 1 for no gain. Ruling is that McGee's momentum carried him into the end zone. No touchback. Play Challenged by BUF and REVERSED. 4-A.Vinatieri kicks 70 yards from NE 30 to BUF 0. 24-T.McGee, Touchback.
